api-integration.title: API Integration
api-integration.description: This page explains how the Cosmic Crypto Tracker integrates with cryptocurrency APIs to fetch and display real-time data.

challenges.title: Challenges & Solutions
challenges.description: This page documents the key challenges faced during the development of the Cosmic Crypto Tracker and how they were addressed.

getting-started.title: Getting Started
getting-started.description: Welcome to the Cosmic Crypto Tracker documentation! This guide will help you set up and run the project locally.

state-management.title: State Management
state-management.description: This page explains the state management approach used in the Cosmic Crypto Tracker application.
